original_text: There were also women looking on from a distance, among whom were Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James the younger and of Joses, and Salome.
korean_text: 멀리서 바라보는 여자들도 있었는데 그 중에 막달라 마리아와 또 작은 야고보와 요세의 어머니 마리아와 또 살로메가 있었으니

sentences.original_text: There were also women looking on from a distance
and Mary the mother of James the younger and of Joses
sentences.korean_translation: 작은 야고보와 요세의 어머니 마리아도 있었고,
